resources.string: Max GLSL Cache Size (enter -1 to disable)
Use ANGLE as OpenGL ES driver
Error: number cannot be 0 or less than -1.

⚠️ Important Notice:

 • Setting a custom OpenGL version may cause game crashes or rendering issues — proceed with caution!
 • If any issues occur, please disable this feature first!
 • Once you enable this feature, we will no longer accept any bug reports related to additional issues! Before reporting problems, please make sure to disable this feature!
 • For stability, do not enable this feature unless absolutely necessary (e.g., mods requiring specific OpenGL versions)!

It looks like you denied the permission request for MobileGlues.
You must grant 'external storage' permission to modify the renderer settings.

Please find and grant this permission on the next screen.

Modifying rendering options requires read and write permissions. Please grant read and write permissions before making changes.
You will need to select this directory later: 
%s
If a folder named MG does not exist, please create one manually.
Enabling the incomplete OpenGL43 extension may cause issues with some shaders and mods. Are you sure you want to continue?
Enabling the incomplete ARB_compute_shader extension may cause issues with some shaders and mods. Are you sure you want to continue?
Enabling ANGLE on Adreno 740 devices is highly likely to cause severe rendering issues. Are you sure you want to continue?
Enabling the ANGLE Depth Clear Workaround fixes the issue of the handheld items being obscured in vanilla Minecraft 1.21.5+, but may cause performance degradation. Are you sure you want to continue?

Enabling the built-in FSR1 may cause image corruption on some drivers.\nIf your device is equipped with an Adreno GPU, please enable ANGLE to ensure correct rendering.\nIt is known that enabling this feature together with ANGLE can cause performance degradation, so please enable with caution.

Path error! Please select: 
%1$s
but you selected:
%2$s

This action will completely delete all files associated with MobileGlues. This includes:

 • All configuration files: Any of your custom settings, preferences, and possible configuration files required for the application to run will be removed.
 • Cache files: The GLSL cache generated by MobileGlues during runtime (used to speed up loading) will be cleared.
 • Log files: Log files generated during the operation of MobileGlues will be deleted.
 • Folder access permissions: The read and write access permissions that the MobileGlues app currently has to specific folders in the device's storage will be revoked.

 Please note, this action is irreversible. Once you click "OK", all the files mentioned above will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. If you are going to use MobileGlues again in the future, you will need to reconfigure it.

 Are you sure you want to continue?
MobileGlues related files have been completely removed.\nIf you need to completely remove MobileGlues from your device, please uninstall this software.
